mapper.select: SELECT p.patientno "patientNO",s.serviceno "serviceNo", p.patientname "patientName", p.patientaddr "patientAddr", p.patientsex "patientSex",p.patientbirth "patientBirth", p.patientfamilytel "patientFamilyTel", p.patientdisease "patientDisease", p.patientgrade "patientGrade", p.patientblood "patientBlood", p.patientmedication "patientMedication",p.patientunique "patientUnique", p.patienttel "patientTel",h.helpername "helperName", s.servicestarttime "serviceStartTime", s.serviceendtime "serviceEndTime", s.servicedemand "serviceDemand", s.familyNo "familyNo", s.serviceprice "servicePrice", s.helperprice "helperPrice", s.serviceprice * (1-c.codename) as "commission" FROM patient p,serviceapply s, code c, helper h WHERE h.helperno = s.helperno and h.helperno = #{helperNo} and s.patientno = p.patientno and h.commissiongrade = c.codeid and s.serviceno = #{serviceNo}

SELECT reviewwriter "reviewWriter",reviewdate "reviewDate", reviewcontents "reviewContents" ,reviewstar "reviewStar",reviewno "reviewNo" FROM review WHERE serviceNo IN ( SELECT serviceNo FROM serviceapply WHERE familyNo = #{familyNo}) AND reviewWriter not in #{familyNo}
